channel.title: The Way Station
channel.itunes:author: Noah Read
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Way Station is a podcast, hosted by Noah Read, featuring interviews with trailblazers who set the course of their own careers.
channel.itunes:summary: The Way Station is a podcast featuring interviews with trailblazers who set the course of their own careers. My name is Noah Read and I host the podcast. They guests have varied interests and come from a wide range of creative and entrepreneurial fields. Join me and learn from those who are cutting a path and following their passions.
channel.description: The Way Station is a podcast featuring interviews with trailblazers who set the course of their own careers. My name is Noah Read and I host the podcast. They guests have varied interests and come from a wide range of creative and entrepreneurial fields. Join me and learn from those who are cutting a path and following their passions.

item.title: Colin Devroe
item.dc:creator: Noah Read
item.description:
This week's guest on The Way Station is Colin Devroe. Colin is a longtime web entrepreneur who has cofounded Plain, the creators of Barley CMS and Barley for Wordpress. We talk about technology and creating products that solve problems.

Links:

  • Plain
  • Colin on Twitter
  • Colin on ADN

Favorite Things:

  • Colin's favorite things: Barley, Twitter Connect & Discover, and IFTTT
  • Noah's favorite thing: Square Cash
item.itunes:author: Noah Read
item.itunes:subtitle: Colin is a longtime web entrepreneur who has cofounded Plain, the creators of Barley CMS and Barley for Wordpress. We talk about technology and creating products that solve problems.
item.itunes:summary: This week’s guest on The Way Station is Colin Devroe. Colin is a longtime web entrepreneur who has cofounded Plain, the creators of Barley CMS and Barley for Wordpress. We talk about technology and creating products that solve problems.

item.title: Nathan Grigg
item.dc:creator: Noah Read
item.description:
This week's guest on The Way Station is Nathan Grigg. Nathan is a mathematician with a background in academic research who has recently started working at Google as a software engineer. We talk about career changes, being analytically minded and much more.

Links:

  • Nathan's Website
  • Nathan on Twitter
  • Nathan on ADN

Favorite Things:

  • Nathan's favorite thing: Day One
  • Noah's favorite things: 1491, and 1493 by Charles C. Mann
item.itunes:author: Noah Read
item.itunes:subtitle: This week’s guest on The Way Station is Nathan Grigg. Nathan is a mathematician with a background in academic research who has recently started working at Google as a software engineer. We talk about career changes, being analytically minded and much more.

item.title: Garrett Gibbons
item.dc:creator: Noah Read
item.description:
Garrett Gibbons works as a photographer, music video director, and all around "media guy". We talk about starting a business and running it while not ruining your family. Garrett also shares his master plan, to bring back the musical. Listen in, it's fantastic.

Garrett's Website

Garrett on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Noah Read
item.itunes:subtitle: Garrett Gibbons works as a photographer, music video director, and all around “media guy”.
item.itunes:summary: Garrett Gibbons works as a photographer, music video director, and all around “media guy”.

item.title: Collin Donnell
item.dc:creator: Noah Read
item.description:
Collin Donnell is a talented iOS developer, with an eye for design, who has worked on hits, such as Things and Air Display. He is also the creator of Pinbook, one of my most used apps. His latest venture is co-founding Braid Labs, whose first app will tackle email. We talk about making it in the growing field of iOS development and what it takes to make great products.

Links:

  • Collin's website
  • Braid Labs
  • Collin on Twitter
  • Collin on ADN
item.itunes:author: Noah Read
item.itunes:subtitle: Collin Donnell is an iOS developer with an eye for design.
item.itunes:summary: Collin Donnell is an iOS developer, with an eye for design, who has created Pinbook and co-founded Braid Labs.

item.title: Tony Murray
item.dc:creator: Noah Read
item.description:
Tony Murray is a professional landscape photography whose work features beautiful vistas from the Tetons, to Qatar, to the Himalayas. We talk about what it takes to be a professional photographer in the age of Instagram and cheap digital cameras.

  • Shot Rockers
  • Tony's Website
item.itunes:author: Noah Read
item.itunes:subtitle: Tony Murray is a professional landscape photographer.
item.itunes:summary: Tony Murray is a professional landscape photography whose work features beautiful vistas from the Tetons, to Qatar, to the Himalayas. We talk about what it takes to be a professional photographer in the age of Instagram and cheap digital cameras.

item.title: Amber Hooper
item.dc:creator: Noah Read
item.description:
This week's guest is Amber Hooper. She's a talented industrial designer with a focus on medical equipment and processes. She talks about how she ended up in her dream job and the twists and turns along the way. It's a pretty great story.

Amber's Twitter: @outdoorber

  • BYU Industrial Design Program
  • Candle Warmers
  • University of Utah: Spark Labs
  • Stanford D School
  • IDEO

Amber's Favorite Thing: Couscous Mediterranean Grill

Noah's Favorite Thing: Banbury Cross
item.itunes:author: Noah Read
item.itunes:subtitle: Noah Read and Amber Hooper discuss her path towards designing medical equipment and processes.
item.itunes:summary: Noah Read and Amber Hooper discuss her path towards designing medical equipment and processes.
